install.name: eshop_quantity
install.title: Quantity Shipping
install.author: Giang Dinh Truong
install.description: This is Quantity Shipping method for Eshop

field.name: min_total
field.label: Min Total
field.description: If the total amount reach Min Total, then the Quantity Shipping will be disable and the Free Shipping will be available. Leave 0 if you do not want to use it.

field.name: min_quantity
field.label: Min Quantity
field.description: If the total quantity reach Min Quantity, then the Quantity Shipping will be disable and the Free Shipping will be available. Leave 0 if you do not want to use it.

field.name: show_shipping_cost_with_tax
field.label: Show Shipping Cost With Tax
field.description: If Yes, once you choose a Tax Class below, it will display shipping cost include tax.

field.name: payment_methods
field.label: Payment Methods
field.description: Choose corresponding available payment methods when Quantity Shipping method is chosen. Select all or Un-select all to choose all payment methods.

field.name: customer_groups
field.label: Customer Groups
field.description: Choose the customer groups to apply quantity shipping.
